title: Keto Cheesecake
description: Something to help your sweet tooth!
instructions: To make almond flour, blend a bag of almonds in a food processor and put this to one side.
Put the butter in the microwave for 60 seconds to melt it then add this to the blended almonds.
Mix together and dish out to create the base.
In a food processor add the soft cheese, lemon or lime juice, whipping cream and stevia.
Once whipped nicely place over the base. Add raspberries if you like
Place in the fridge for an hour to set.
